plot: Confronting the events that turned her into the Hangman - and led to a decade-long fight for survival in Arkham - Sofia makes plans for a more hopeful future.

Sofia remembers how she became known as "The Hangman", and spent ten years in Arkham Asylum fighting to keep her sanity. In the present, Sofia has dinner with her family, and announces that she's taking their advice and flying to Italy out of hope for a new life.—Gislef
